main event: Two bright lights appeared in the sky, hovered for a moment, then disappeared, with flare-like lights seen on occasion.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 10 minutes., The number of confirmed objects was reported as four., The observation was performed from the ground., The source of the observation was civilian., The report concluded the sighting was possibly balloons or astronomical phenomena.
sighted object: two bright lights and a cluster of silver objects
